title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 12 §§ 192-1.1 - Permissible Methods of Payment
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 12 §§ 192-1.1 - Permissible Methods of Payment

State Regulations

Employees may be paid wages by employers using the
following permissible methods: (a) Cash; (b) Check; (c) Direct Deposit; or
(d) Payroll Debit Card. Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 12
§§
192-1.1

Adopted

New

York State Register September 7, 2016/Volume XXXVIII, Issue 36, eff. 3/7/2017

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
